Name: Decent Combat Orders
Desc:
It increases all of your skills' levels for a set duration, allowing you to raise the skill levels beyond the master level for 4th job skills, for other skills, it can only raise them to the master level
However, certain special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, Useful Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot have their skill levels increased
It does not stack with Combat Orders.
